user-login.TITLE: User Login Step - Required for Use in Wordpress.

contact-search.TITLE: Contact Search Step - Required for selecting other Contacts

contact-update.TITLE: Generic Contact Update Step -  Can have multiple.

courses.TITLE: Course Search/Select Step - Required if not passing course ID to the widget

portfolio.TITLE: Portfolio Upload/Download step. Requires a portfolio checklist

review.TITLE: The Enrolment Review Step - This step is required for any Course Enrolment

complete.TITLE: Displays a Completion message, indicating that the process is Complete. Only selectable once all required fields complete

agent-courses.TITLE: The Agent-Courses step will allow multiple courses to be selected for agents, and show commissions.

enrol.TITLE: The Enrolment or Billing Step. Allows selection of enrolment methods and finalisation of enrolments.

enrol-details.TITLE: Allows custom data to be passed through to the Course/Enrol Call

course-enquiry.TITLE: Allows for course/general enquiries to be passed through. Requires a contact.

contact-note.TITLE: Allows for data that does not have a corresponding field to be passed through, added as a contact note in aXcelerate.

group-booking.TITLE: Allows for group bookings, bringing together multiple enrolments accross course types.
